title: Product of the Week: Martell Wine Holder
description: Elevate your holiday table with the luxurious Martell Wine Holder!
author: Anzah
excerpt: The Martell Wine Holder features a handcrafted gold-toned iron design, white marble base, and holds two bottles, perfect for elegant dining and holiday entertaining.
text: Looking to add some pizzazz to your next festive gathering? The Martell Wine Holder is stunning and functional, and easily makes its way into our top picks for holiday table decor. Each piece is handcrafted, which means every holder is uniquely one-of-a-kind. Talk about adding a personal touch to your space!
